:KitKat::

She smelled the air.  It make her nose sting.  "What happened here? 
Where are they?" She looked at the pool and walked closer to the pool.
She sniffed near the water's edge. It smelled of something that she 
had never smelled before. It had a terrable smell to it.
"What is that muck?"  She looked into the water.  It was too black 
and too dark to see anything.  She turned and looked at Rowdy. She 
was getting worried for her comrads.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@h...> 
wrote:
> Rowdy Wolf:
> 
> 
> Rowdy Wolf followed KitKat into the tunnel, where it lead to the 
large, dark 
> pool. He didn't like the scent of things. It pinned his ears and 
eyed the 
> area warily.
> 
>
